overview: Survival Basics II focuses on the skills found in Volumes four and five of the Woodsmaster Video Series plus Karen Hood’s Cave  Cooking!  Learn how to…  Find your direction with a stick as your guide Use the stars to navigate use your wrist watch as a compass Hungry? Meat or Maggots – you decide Trap your own food with several different methods Gourmet cooking? Watch and learn. Yum! Determine your traveling distance with nature as a tool All with close-up details!
title: Survival Basics II
